title: Problem 2104_E
statement: Let's call a letter allowed if it is a lowercase letter and is one of the first k letters of the Latin alphabet.You are given a string s of length n, consisting only of allowed letters.Let's call a string t pleasant if t is a subsequence of s.You are given q strings t_1, t_2, ..., t_q. All of them consist only of allowed letters. For each string t_i, calculate the minimum number of allowed letters you need to append to it on the right so that it stops being pleasant.A sequence t is a subsequence
